title: Bloody Trapland 1.41 Custom name, online support
description:
[size=200]Change the text inside of username.txt BEFORE YOU ENTER A CDKEY to change your name in game.[/size]

[b]How to play:[/b]

1) Extract it. It was zipped using 7-zip on "Ultra", if you have unzipping troubles get 7-zip, it is free.
2) Change the default username if you plan on playing online (see below)
3) Run the game
4) Enter any alphanumeric characters for the cd-key
5) Play the game, try not to die

[b]How to change your name:[/b]

Change the text inside of username.txt BEFORE YOU ENTER A CDKEY to change your name in game.

If you have already entered "your" CD Key, do the following:
0) Close the game if it is open
1) Copy your save from "%appdata%/Bloody Trapland" to the same folder as "Bloody Trapland SaveFudger.exe"
2) Open SaveFudger, click "Decrypt"
3) Open the generated "saves.txt"
4) Change the place near the bottom of the file where it has your old name to whatever name you want
5) Save it
6) Make sure you saved it
7) Click "Encrypt" on SaveFudger and copy the "saves_new.btl" file
8) Go back to "%appdata%/Bloody Trapland"
9) Rename your old "saves.btl" in there to "saves_old.btl"
10) Paste the "saves_new.btl" file in that folder with your original save
11) Rename "saves_new.btl" to "saves.btl"
12) Try playing, see if it changed. If it didn't work, contact me here

[b]Multiplayer Tips:[/b]
- Runs on port 6883
- If you can't portforward, use Hamachi or Tunngle or Evolve
- Players must connect directly to your IP

[b]Other:[/b]
Link for the online fix, save editor, and custom name support only: http://url.cn/ImNIPw (requires the full game from another torrent)
Link for the entire contents of this torrent: http://url.cn/RF6tPa (direct download from Tencent Cloud)
